Package io.github.cjstehno.ersatz.util

Interface BasicAuth

public interface BasicAuth
Helper utility for configuring BASIC request authentication.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final String
    AUTHORIZATION_HEADER
    The authorization header name.

  • Method Summary

    Static Methods
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static Request
    basicAuth(Request request, String userame, String password)
    Shortcut method for configuring BASIC authentication on a request expectation with the provided username and password.
    static String
    header(String username, String password)
    Used to generate the Authorization header value for the given username and password.

  • Field Details

    • AUTHORIZATION_HEADER

      static final String AUTHORIZATION_HEADER
      The authorization header name.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

  • Method Details

    • header

      static String header(String username, String password)
      Used to generate the Authorization header value for the given username and password.
      Parameters:
      username - the username (cannot contain a colon)
      password - the password (cannot contain a colon)
      Returns:
      the generated header value

    • basicAuth

      static Request basicAuth(Request request, String userame, String password)
      Shortcut method for configuring BASIC authentication on a request expectation with the provided username and password.
      Parameters:
      request - the request expectation
      userame - the username (cannot contain a colon)
      password - the password (cannot contain a colon)
      Returns:
      the request passed in (to allow chaining)
